title: the magnificent twisted fate
body: So i was recently got a mystery skin gift and it was the magnificent twisted fate while i LOVE twisted fate and main him when will that skin get reworked and add new effects i saw some post from like 2012 saying that riot will soon rework this skin and its 2015 and not worth at all and some people are gonna say ohhhh its legacy and all that but it just doesnt add anything for you doesnt make you look cool or anything just kinda there being useless.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Riot rework the skin, it costs so much and it nothing else happens?

Lol. I mystery gifted my friend and he also received the Magnificent Twisted Fate.  I do think that they should rework the skin, not remove it as it is unfair to those who actually bought the skin for 1820 RP at the time it was released. Besides, other than this skin, I don't think that there are other legendary skins that need a rework.

But (on a side note), I read that the skin was/is/is now worth 520 RP according to an app I have. Riot, can you fix this for us?

Why would you take skins out? That's ridiculous and pretty messed up considering people need to buy them.
But yes, regardless of how rare they now are, they need to get nice texture updates like every newer skin does.
i didnt say i wanted them gone but i want to know what the community thinks.
